properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs.
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-to prevent bank erosion

Vegetative cover improving along the river banks Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5

properties.Observatio: Existing Earthen canal,  some places Constructed of 600mm x 600mm (width x height) rectangular concrete lining, Water from this canal is used to grow paddy on an area of about 60 acres.it is built parallel to the main canal.
properties.Descript_1:

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: There is a damage wooden bridge.3 .5 m long and 0.8m wide. The pillars are 2.5m high.
